content.question: Why is Weijie extremely busy this semester?

choices.label: He has to take a remedial English class.
He is working as a math tutor.
He is learning how to paint.
He is participating in several extracurricular activities.

content.answer: He is participating in several extracurricular activities.

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
